transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Ji, so I am Alpana, talking from IndiaMART head office. Sir, your request came for call back.
Customer: Ji madam. Accha ye bataiye jo apni profile hai Clifort.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Madam ye sab kuch to theek hi chal raha hai iske andar. Isme mere paas inquiries kyun nahi aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Accha. Ek second main check kar leti hu. Na koi call aati hai, na inquiries aati hai. Kya ho gaya isko profile ko?
Executive: Inquiry. Sir kal aayi to thi aapko ek wild animal wooden toy ke liye.
Customer: Madam ye inquiry mere kisi kaam ki nahi hai. Inme hum ye chhoti jo 10-10, 20-20, 50-50 piece ki quantity hai hum nahi deal karte inme.
Executive: Accha. Wooden sling pup ke liye?
Customer: Sling pup quantity kitni hai?
Executive: Sir inquiry aayi hui hai isme unhone quantity nahi dala hua hai. Educational wooden toy ke liye likha hai child.
Customer: Koi bhi koi bhi reply nahi karta. Theek hai?
Executive: Hmm. Hmm.
Customer: Main bahut baar baat kar chuka hu.
Executive: Accha. Ye jo aayi hai. Accha. Aapse meri baat hui thi abhi sir kuch services ko leke. To maine bola tha ek baar video meet pe aapko aane ko. Do carton ke liye aayi hai sir carton ka kya hai?
Customer: Carton kaisa?
Executive: Educational educational toy ke liye aayi ki age group 023 quantity three two cartons.
Customer: Hmm. Sir isme koi haan ye bhi nahi chahiye na madam yaha ki. Ek baar aap locations check kar lo ki location sahi dali hui hai ya nahi ya mere hi paas inquiries nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha. Bilaspur ki bhi aayi hai aapko Saharanpur se nahi chahiye na aapne mujhe bola hai.
Customer: Nahi chahiye madam.
Executive: Accha. Chalo ek baar location check kar lo na aap. Main main location hi aapka check kar rahi hu. Madam mujhe chhoti chhoti inquiry hai nahi chahiye mujhe maine bataya to aapko.
Executive: Accha. 10-10 piece banaunga kya manufacturing mein main?
Executive: Ji nahi sir main samajh rahi hu ek second. Buylead ke sath bhi wahi cheez ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Wahi hai sab kuch. Kisi ka call nahi aa raha ab tak. Pichle teen mahine se koi aisa koi bhi call nahi hai jisme main koi kaam kar saku.
Customer: Mujhe lag raha hai maine ye is baar leke hi galat kar diya teen saal ka package.
Executive: No no call no call aapki last month hui hai usme se aapne paanch uthaiye char miss call mein padi hui thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur averagely sir har mahine aapko 10, 9, 10 hi call aati hai mahine ki.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To nau call aapko aayi usme se char call aapki miss call mein bhi padi hui hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To call aayi hai call but haan aap jo keh rahe ho ki kam aayi hai wo main samajh sakti hu ki kam aayi hai. But sir call to matlab aa rahi hai aapko har isi mahine aapko call aayi hai. Nau call.
Customer: Ek baar aap location check karenge madam please.
Executive: Location kaun sa check karna hai mujhe bataye kya location check karna hai mujhe. Buylead matlab meri profile aap ek baar check kar lo ye bilkul perfect hai.
Executive: Main mere samne open hai aapki profile.
Customer: Haan ji. Mujhe aap bataye kaha aapko problem lag rahi hai jo aap chah rahe hai ki isko theek kar lo. Aap check karo na madam mujhe kya pata aap check kijiye.
Customer: Agar mujhe IndiaMART ke bare mein jyada pata hota.
Executive: Sir ek cheez hai. Accha mujhe ye bataye jo aap buylead utha rahe hain theek hai jo verified leads utha rahe hain sir unka kya status hai jo aapne proper badi buylead uthai. Koi response nahi hai sab fake fake lagti hai mujhe to. Koi bhi buyer baat hui phone phone nahi karta phone uthata nahi hai.
Customer: Uthata nahi hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. To matlab koi bhi customer jaise jo aap jaise ye sab jo aapne uthaiye kid games ki theek hai wooden. Zero main keh raha hu koi bhi phone nahi uthata madam.
Executive: Agar phone utha liya to bolte hain ki koi inquiry nahi hai. Fake lead hai.
Executive: Accha. Accha. Sir aisa karti hu main jo hai concern person unko main bolti hu ki aapse abhi aap video meet pe aa sakte hain?
Customer: Ji bataye kya karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai main unse bol rahi hu aapko inform kare aur aap usi time hum aapko kuch achi leads consume karwayenge. Aap consume kariye aur instantly phir baat kariye us customer se. Theek hai? Ek baar bas aap jo hai na ID kholiye theek hai main batata hu kya main kya kehna chah raha hu. Lok ye jo set your buylead.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Set your buylead professions ye kya cheez hai?
Executive: Kaha pe sir?
Customer: Setting mein jaake madam.
Executive: Buylead preference wala option?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Wo to dekhiye preference kya hota hai sir wo preference us hisab se banta hai jis jis area se aap lead sabse jyada uthate hain. Us hisab se aapki yaha pe preference create ho jati hai.
Customer: Aapki yaha pe preference create nahi hai. Preference kya hai? Not preference ka matlab hota hai ki aapko is area se lead nahi chahiye.
Executive: Aur prefer category mein hota hai ki kis prefer category aapne uthai hai aur not preferred category ka matlab hota hai ki aapko kisko kis category mein kis product mein aapko nahi karna hai business.
Customer: Hmm. Main ek baar na aise karti hu sir aap mujhe main aapko link bhijwa rahi hu theek hai Amit se bolti hu aapka ek baar aapse video meet kare aur aapki problem ko instantly video meet pe hi resolve kare sir. Theek hai aap mujhe paanch minute ka time dijiye main call back karwa rahi hu. Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough relevant buyleads/inquiries.

- Current buyleads are of low quantity/fake.

- Wants to check profile location settings.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meet with expert.

- Executive explained buylead preference settings.

- Executive will arrange a call back in 5 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to arrange video meet with expert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, location, inquiries, preference
